title: Deploy AC Buy Application to Internet Computer Mainnet

requirements.summary: Verify frontend configuration is mainnet-ready and ensure Internet Identity authentication works with mainnet deployment
acceptanceCriteria: Application is deployed to Internet Computer mainnet (not local replica)
A permanent canister URL is generated in the format https://[canister-id].icp0.io or https://[canister-id].raw.icp0.io
The URL is publicly accessible and can be shared with customers
All existing features function correctly on mainnet including customer submission form, pricing information, contact page, and authenticated admin dashboard
Internet Identity authentication works on mainnet for admin dashboard access
Customer submissions are persisted on mainnet storage

file_operations.description: Verify that Internet Identity authentication configuration supports mainnet deployment by ensuring the AuthClient is initialized without local-only settings and can handle mainnet Internet Identity service URLs
Verify that the backend actor initialization correctly uses mainnet canister IDs from environment configuration and supports mainnet host URLs for agent creation
Verify that the HTML entry point contains no hardcoded local development URLs and properly references bundled assets for mainnet deployment
